channel.title: HELP ME, making my own serv
channel.description:
Ok so im making my own server :D but when i type my ip in the address bar it doesnt work, error 404 not found...something like that and well can somebody help me
-------------------------------------------
run > cmd > ipconfig i used all of them - nothing! Also tried lots of diff websites for my ip\router ip
-------------------------------------------
Help is appreciated

item.title: HELP ME, making my own serv
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Dont you still need to follow these steps:

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

?? Confused ??

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME, making my own serv
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

NO no, i havent made my server yet

ULTIMATE SERVER GUIDE ! :

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Does not work!

Read full topic
